summary: Comprehensive testing of Admin Panel lazy loading and Featured Video feature. All tests passed successfully. Backend APIs working correctly (19/19 tests passed). Frontend features working: admin login, lazy loading tabs, video CRUD operations, homepage video display.
passed_tests: API root endpoint returns correct message
Categories endpoint returns all talent categories
Admin login with valid credentials (admin@bangalorefashionmag.com)
Admin login rejects invalid credentials
GET /api/video returns video data
POST /api/admin/video creates new video
DELETE /api/admin/video removes video
Pending talents tab loads data correctly
All Talents tab loads data correctly
Hero Images tab loads data correctly
Contest & Winners tab loads data correctly
Advertisements tab loads data correctly
Magazine tab loads data correctly
Background Music tab loads data correctly
Full video CRUD flow works (Create→Read→Delete→Verify)
Vimeo video type support works
Homepage displays video when present
Homepage hides video section when no video exists
Admin can add YouTube video URL via Featured Video tab
Admin can delete video and it disappears from homepage
Lazy loading implemented - tabs only fetch data when clicked
critical_code_review_comments: Minor: ESLint warnings for missing useEffect dependencies (loadTabData, onUpdate) - not critical but could be fixed with useCallback
Good: Lazy loading properly implemented with loadedTabs state tracking
Good: Video URL parsing handles multiple YouTube URL formats (youtu.be, youtube.com/watch?v=)
seed_data_creation: Restored video 'BFM Fashion Show 2025' with YouTube URL https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dQw4w9WgXcQ
context_for_next_testing_agent: Admin panel lazy loading implemented with loadedTabs state. Video feature fully functional. Test credentials: admin@bangalorefashionmag.com / Admin@123BFM. Video is currently set to 'BFM Fashion Show 2025'.
features_tested: Admin panel loads quickly with lazy loading (only fetches data for active tab) - VERIFIED
Featured Video tab in admin allows adding YouTube video URL - VERIFIED
Added video appears on homepage below hero slider as embedded player - VERIFIED
Admin can delete video and it disappears from homepage - VERIFIED
Switching between admin tabs fetches data correctly - VERIFIED
All other admin tabs still work (Pending, All Talents, Hero Images, Contest & Winners, Ads, Magazine, Background Music) - VERIFIED
